#summary Description of Maven configuration.

= Maven configuration =

Currently JMapper is not present in the Maven repository, so you must install it locally.

== Installation command ==
{{{
mvn install:install-file 
-Dfile="jar location\jmapper-core-1.0.0.jar"
-DgroupId=it.avutils.jmapper
-DartifactId=jmapper-core
-Dversion=1.0.0
-Dpackaging=jar
}}}
== Dependency ==
JMapper requires the slf4j and log4j dependencies to handle exceptions.
{{{
<dependency>
   <groupId>it.avutils.jmapper</groupId>
   <artifactId>core</artifactId>
   <version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
<dependency> 
   <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
   <artifactId>slf4j-log4j12</artifactId>
   <version>1.6.6</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
   <groupId>log4j</groupId>
   <artifactId>log4j</artifactId>
   <version>1.2.17</version>
</dependency>
}}}
